Barcelona Supercomputing Center (BSC) | Research Engineer | Barcelona | On-site, Visa

Our research group at BSC is working on improving the management of Software Defined Infrastructures for next generation data centers. We are looking for a research engineer to work on the modernization of workloads (in particular, genomics) to take advantage of acceleration through FPGAs and NVM.

https://www.bsc.es/join-us/job-offers/job-offers-list/205css...

If you are interested or have questions, feel free to send me an email: jorda.polo@bsc.es
